Questions.Question: Which streaming service is known for its original series 'Stranger Things'?
Questions.Explanation: Netflix is the streaming service that produced the popular series 'Stranger Things'.

Questions.Question: Which streaming service is associated with the show 'The Handmaid's Tale'?
Questions.Explanation: Hulu is the streaming service that airs the critically acclaimed series 'The Handmaid's Tale'.

Questions.Question: Which streaming service is known for its original series 'The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel'?
Questions.Explanation: Amazon Prime Video is the streaming service that produced the award-winning series 'The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel'.

Questions.Question: Which streaming service is associated with the show 'The Mandalorian'?
Questions.Explanation: Disney+ is the streaming service that airs the popular series 'The Mandalorian' set in the Star Wars universe.

Questions.Explanation: Netflix is the streaming service that produced the hit series 'Orange is the New Black'.
